prompt: Two trains of same length take 10s to cross each other when moving opposite, 20s when same direction. Ratio of speeds?
explanation: Let speeds be a,b. (a+b)×10 = 2L and (a-b)×20 = 2L. a+b = 2(a-b). a = 3b. Ratio = 3:1
